get_all_tickets_by_status.description: Get All Tickets by selected status from Freshdesk.

get_contact_from_id.description: Get contacts details from Freshdesk using ID number.

props.name: contactid
props.description: The ID number of the contact

get_contacts.description: Get contact details from Freshdesk for all (optional filtered) contacts.

props.name: filter_type
props.description: Select one and provide the value.

props.name: filter_value
props.description: Provide value if previous option selected!

props.name: filter_status
props.description: Can filter by state: blocked, deleted, unverified or verified.

props.name: per_page
props.description: Freshdesk calls this per_page - set to 0 for all, if specified maximum is 100

get_ticket_status.description: Get Ticket status from Freshdesk. Returns ticket_status, assigned_status, assigned_id

props.name: ticketid
props.description: The Ticket ID to return status
